controllers
Class QController

java.lang.Object
  play.mvc.Controller
      controllers.QController
All Implemented Interfaces:
play.classloading.enhancers.ControllersEnhancer.ControllerSupport, play.classloading.enhancers.LocalvariablesNamesEnhancer.LocalVariablesSupport
Direct Known Subclasses:
Qaccount, Qdirect_messages, Qfavorites, Qfriendships, Qsearch, Qstatuses, Qusers
public abstract class QController
extends play.mvc.Controller

Main class for all the REST API controllers.

Author:
Dario

Clean cache up aspect.

getOverlay

protected static Overlay getOverlay()
Obtains the overlay object from global configuration hash. Yes, this is a dirty hack ;) but it is not serializable so I need to hold it somewhere and I don't feel sure having it as an static field of this class (yet).

Returns:

checkOverlay

private static void checkOverlay()
Checks if the overlay is active. If not, it creates it and store it.

Builds cache key for format data stored in it.

Send an error response in the format of the request (request-level available).

Parameters:
status - HTTP status code
error - Message

renderError

protected static void renderError(java.lang.Exception e)
Send an error response in the format requested, from an exception and assuming HTTP status code 500. If given exception is a QantiqaException, it takes the status from it.

Parameters:
e -

checkIfAuthenticationIsRequired

private static void checkIfAuthenticationIsRequired(java.lang.reflect.Method m)
Check if authentication is required by the requested API method. It renders the errors in an independent way because it needs to throw an unauthorized response (Play works with Exceptions as renderers).

Parameters:
m - Reflected method obtained from Play.

renderProtobuf

protected static void renderProtobuf(com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder builder)
Helper method to render our Protobuf builders. It is not the used in Higgs because the different treatment of output format (requested by the REST API caller).

Parameters:
builder -

protected static void renderProtobuf(com.google.protobuf.Message msg)
Helper method to render Protobuf message according the request format.

getUser

protected static Protocol.user getUser(java.lang.String unknown,

Common method to get users from unknown data. Possible issue with users with numeric nicknames, e.g. 101010.

appendUser

protected static Protocol.status appendUser(Protocol.status msg,
